00036 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE> class array
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039     TYPE cont[SIZE];
00040     typedef TYPE *iterator;
00041     typedef const TYPE *const_iterator;
00042     iterator begin() {return cont;}
00043     const_iterator begin()const {return cont;}
00044     iterator end() {return cont + SIZE;}
00045     const_iterator end()const {return cont + SIZE;}
00046 };

00049 template < typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER = _internal::array<TYPE, SIZE> >
00050 class FixedVector: protected CONTAINER
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     typedef typename CONTAINER::iterator iterator;
00054     typedef typename CONTAINER::const_iterator const_iterator;
00055     typedef FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER> this_class;
00056     typedef CONTAINER container_type;
00057 protected:
00059     template<typename OP> this_class binaryOp ( const this_class &src )const {
00060         this_class ret;
00061         std::transform( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), src.begin(), ret.begin(), OP() );
00062         return ret;
00063     }
00064     template<typename OP> this_class binaryOp( const TYPE &src )const {
00065         this_class ret;
00066         iterator dst = ret.begin();
00067         const OP op = OP();
00068 
00069         for ( const_iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++, dst++ )
00070             *dst = op( *i, src );
00071 
00072         return ret;
00073     }
00074     template<typename OP> this_class unaryOp()const {
00075         this_class ret;
00076         std::transform( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), ret.begin(), OP() );
00077         return ret;
00078     }
00079 public:
00081     // Contructor stuff
00083 
00087     FixedVector() {fill( TYPE() ); }
00088 
00092     FixedVector( const TYPE src[SIZE] ) {
00093         std::copy( src, src + SIZE, CONTAINER::begin() );
00094     }
00095 
00097     void fill( const TYPE &val ) {
00098         std::fill( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), val );
00099     }
00100     size_t getBiggestVecElemAbs( ) const {
00101         size_t biggestVecElem = 0;
00102         TYPE tmpValue = 0;
00103 
00104         for ( size_t vecElem = 0; vecElem < SIZE; vecElem++ ) {
00105             if ( fabs( operator[]( vecElem ) ) > fabs( tmpValue ) ) {
00106                 biggestVecElem = vecElem;
00107                 tmpValue = operator[]( vecElem );
00108             }
00109         }
00110 
00111         return biggestVecElem;
00112     }
00114     // Accessors
00116     const TYPE &operator []( size_t idx )const {
00117         LOG_IF( idx >= SIZE, Debug, error ) << "Index " << idx << " exceeds the size of the vector (" << SIZE << ")";
00118         return CONTAINER::begin()[idx];
00119     }
00120     TYPE &operator []( size_t idx ) {
00121         LOG_IF( idx >= SIZE, Debug, error ) << "Index " << idx << " exceeds the size of the vector (" << SIZE << ")";
00122         return CONTAINER::begin()[idx];
00123     }

00126     // Comparison
00129     bool lexical_less( const this_class &src )const {
00130         const_iterator they = src.begin();
00131         const_iterator me = CONTAINER::begin();
00132 
00133         while ( me != CONTAINER::end() ) {
00134             if ( *they < *me ) return false;
00135             else if ( *me < *they ) return true;
00136 
00137             me++;
00138             they++;
00139         }
00140 
00141         return false;
00142     }
00144     bool lexical_less_reverse( const this_class &src )const {
00145         const_iterator they = src.end();
00146         const_iterator me = CONTAINER::end();
00147 
00148         while ( me != CONTAINER::begin() ) {
00149             me--;
00150             they--;
00151 
00152             if ( *they < *me ) return false;
00153             else if ( *me < *they ) return true;
00154         }
00155 
00156         return false;
00157     }
00159     bool operator==( const this_class &src )const {return std::equal( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), src.begin() );}
00161     bool operator!=( const this_class &src )const {
00162         return !operator==( src );
00163     }
00171     bool fuzzyEqual( const this_class &other, unsigned short scale = 10 )const {
00172         const_iterator b = other.begin();
00173 
00174         for ( const_iterator a = CONTAINER::begin(); a != CONTAINER::end(); ++a, ++b ) {
00175             if ( ! util::fuzzyEqual( *a, *b, scale ) )
00176                 return false;
00177         }
00178 
00179         return true;
00180     }

00212         return unaryOp<std::negate<float> >();

00224     TYPE sqlen()const {return dot( *this );}
00229     TYPE len()const {return std::sqrt( sqlen() );}

00241     const this_class &norm()throw( std::invalid_argument ) {
00242         const TYPE d = len();
00243 
00244         if ( d == 0 )throw( std::invalid_argument( "Trying to normalize a vector of length 0" ) );
00245         else *this = *this / d;
00246 
00247         return *this;
00248     }
00249 
00254     TYPE product()const {
00255         TYPE ret = 1;
00256 
00257         for ( const_iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++ )
00258             ret *= *i;
00259 
00260         return ret;
00261     }

00267     TYPE sum() {
00268         TYPE ret = 0;
00269 
00270         for ( iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++ )
00271             ret += *i;
00272 
00273         return ret;
00274     }

00285     template<class InputIterator> void copyFrom( InputIterator iter_start, InputIterator iter_end ) {
00286         LOG_IF( size_t( std::distance( iter_start, iter_end ) ) > SIZE, Runtime, error )
00287                 << "Copying " << std::distance( iter_start, iter_end ) << " Elements into a vector of the size " << SIZE;
00288         std::copy( iter_start, iter_end, CONTAINER::begin() );
00289     }
00290     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedVector( const FixedVector<TYPE2, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &src ) {
00291         src.copyTo( CONTAINER::begin() );
00292     }

00295     template<typename charT, typename traits> void writeTo( std::basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out )const {
00296         util::listToOStream( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), out, "|", "<", ">" );
00297     }

00305 template<typename TYPE>
00306 class vector4 : public FixedVector<TYPE, 4>
00307 {
00308 public:
00309     vector4() {}
00310     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> vector4( const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4, CONTAINER2> &src ) : FixedVector< TYPE, 4> ( src ) {}
00311     vector4( const TYPE src[4] ): FixedVector< TYPE, 4>( src ) {}
00312     vector4( TYPE first, TYPE second, TYPE third = 0, TYPE fourth = 0 ) {
00313         this->operator[]( 3 ) = fourth;
00314         this->operator[]( 2 ) = third;
00315         this->operator[]( 1 ) = second;
00316         this->operator[]( 0 ) = first;
00317     }
00318 };

00320 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER1, typename CONTAINER2>
00321 FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> maxVector( const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER1> &first, const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &second )
00322 {
00323     FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret( first );
00324 
00325     for ( size_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00326         if ( ret[i] < second[i] )ret[i] = second[i];
00327 
00328     return ret;
00329 }
00330 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER1, typename CONTAINER2>
00331 FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> minVector( const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER1> &first, const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &second )
00332 {
00333     FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret( first );
00334 
00335     for ( size_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00336         if ( ret[i] > second[i] )ret[i] = second[i];
00337 
00338     return ret;
00339 }

00341 typedef vector4<float> fvector4;

00348 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER >
00349 ::isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER> operator-( const ::isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER>& s )
00350 {
00351     return s.negate();
